text: A jack is a tool for lifting heavy items. There are many kinds of jacks. *Car jack or automotive jack - For lifting vehicles. *Scissor jack - The lifting mechanism is shaped similar to a pair of scissors. *House jack - A jack which can lift small buildings that are made of wood or similar lightweight material. *Hydraulic jack - Uses a liquid that is forced into a cylinder by a pump plunger. *Inflatable jack - An airbag-like jack that lifts its load when filled with compressed air. *Bottle jack - A jack with a cylindrical body and a bottle-like neck. Category:Tools
title: Jack (tool)
